Description: The method has 5 parameters. Parameters: nextRun' interval' amount' description' account

The following statement contains a magic number: switch (this.Interval)              {                  case Interval.Day:                      this.NextRun = this.NextRun.AddDays(1);                      break;                  case Interval.Week:                      this.NextRun = this.NextRun.AddDays(7);                      break;                  case Interval.Month:                      this.NextRun = this.NextRun.AddMonths(1);                      break;              }

The following switch statement is missing a default case: switch (this.Interval)              {                  case Interval.Day:                      this.NextRun = this.NextRun.AddDays(1);                      break;                  case Interval.Week:                      this.NextRun = this.NextRun.AddDays(7);                      break;                  case Interval.Month:                      this.NextRun = this.NextRun.AddMonths(1);                      break;              }
